summary:
Fluent in English, French and Arabic and having a solid knowledge and experience in banking and Payment with a proven track record in IT professional service, business consultancy and Presales. Able to multi-task and work under pressure with an efficient time management and ability to deliver on time as well as high presentation and negotiation skills. Ability to deliver presentations and proof of concept on various business areas. Motivated team leader with an ability to work independently and make critical decisions during challenges. Excellent communication and presentation skills and exposure to different countries and geographies acquired during years of direct contact with all types of International banks and professional bankers.

Qualifications & Education:
- Master Degree holder
- Presentation and communication Skills 
- Adapt easily to any environment
-Knowledge in various business areas such ( Business analysis, Banking, Treasury, Investment and financing, Islamic Banking, Digital Banking, Payments, Risk Management)
- Agile Project Management, Account Management, Budget Management.
- Leadership and Teamwork, Communication Skills, Grant Writing.
- Business Development.

profile_positions.description: Worldline is the new world-class leader in the payments and transactional services industry, with a global reach. We are at the forefront of the digital revolution that is shaping new ways of paying, living, doing business and building relationships. Our strengths in innovation are matched by the power and robustness of our platforms, the security of our solutions and the quality of our services.
profile_positions.title: Presales Solutions Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Company Profile:
Path Solutions is a Fintech solution provider serving 150+ financial institutions across 39 countries in different continents with a diversified range of products and services based on the latest technology. The company offers core banking system along with Digital & Social Banking, Mobility, Business Analytics, Risk Management & Compliance and treasury solutions. Its multi-award winning core banking platform iMAL targets different types of conventional and Islamic banks. 

Geographical Coverage:
- GCC & MENA region (Lebanon, Kuwait, Iraq, Syria, Qatar, UAE, Saudi Arabia, Oman, Egypt, Bahrain, Jordan, Tunisia, Algeria, Morocco, Libya)
- Far East (Malaysia, India, Tajikistan, Indonesia)
- Europe (Tureky & London)
- Africa  (Sudan, Mauritania, Senegal, Uganda, Ethiopia, Kenya, Ivory Coast, South Africa, Nigeria)

As a principal consultant within the presales department, I currently responsible of the demo presentation and Proof of concept. I am also engaged in RFP and RFI process from answering the business requirement to the preparation of the proposed solution and proposal.
Part of our responsibilities is also related to business development and follow up on new leads as well as establishing customer relation and identifying up-sale opportunities)
profile_positions.title: Principal Presales Consultant

profile_positions.description: As a Senior Business consultant our responsibilities was to implement core banking solution for multiple types of banks. Familiar with the hole cycle of implementation from Analysis phase until go-live. Worked in multiple business areas such as investment banking, core banking, Financing, compliance and regulatory requirement, Business intelligence.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Consultant

profile_positions.description:
BBAC provides a full range of banking and financial solutions to individuals and businesses through an extensive network of eighty-eight ATMs and forty-five branches comprising forty-one domestic branches, four international branches, one in Cyprus - Limassol and three in Iraq - Erbil, Baghdad and Sulaymaniyah, in addition to two representative offices in the United Arab Emirates - Abu Dhabi and Nigeria-Lagos.

During my employment in the compliance department, I handled all AML monitoring and black list management as well as the coordination with the central bank to monitor and identify any suspicious accounts and transactions.
profile_positions.title: Compliance Officer

profile_positions.description:
As part of our responsibilities, I managed all our T-Bills Subscription from Primary Market and purchases from secondary Market. Also managed the FX and Money market Operations and portfolio.
As well as I had exposure on complex operation such as Structured Product and options. Moreover I handled all the Cash management and financial Gap calculation.
profile_positions.title: Capital Market & Operational Risk Officer
